steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5op7b","text":"It works for the IF of cytoplasm, nucleoplasm, and chromatin-bound proteins, FISH staining of receptive sequences (e.g., telomeric repeats, TEs). Nuclear and cell morphology are nicely maintained.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fcpfp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dllvg","text":"It does not work for the IF of Cna1, γ-H2A.X, and tubulin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":3,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"absn6","text":"-    37% Formaldehyde (! Toxic, handel it in a fume hood)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1jsdo","text":"-    Triton X-100","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ek3eq","text":"-    Sucrose","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"255mb","text":"-    Paraformaldehyde (!Toxic; Cat# A3813, 1000. Applichem)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"617fn","text":"Weight 4 g of paraformaldehyde, add   of water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2l9es","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cp6ou","text":"-    Heat to dissolve paraformaldehyde in a fume hood. Namely, placing the flask on top of a   heat plate with stirring function, for around  , with stirring. Try not let it boil.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":93,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":141,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aqu7n","text":"-    Leave it on bench to cool for around   (do not make it completely cool, otherwise sugar dissolves very slow).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7hf39","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"84604DB08EC811ECB625173F75285685","id":"88580","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"52D580D08EC811ECB625173F75285685","id":"48911","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"170","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1500,"guid":"600D98F08EC811ECB625173F75285685","id":"79606","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"6494A7B08EC811ECB625173F75285685","id":"79607","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fn87a","text":"Add 3.4 g of Sugar into the warm paraformaldehyde solution, stir/dissolve it.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b7vau","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8m78h","text":"-    leave it at room temperature overnight and then store it in a fridge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2fcqe","text":"10% Triton X-100  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"dq5f2","text":"-    Add   of Triton X-100 into   of water. Microwave for 5s will let Triton X-100 dissolve rapidly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"961nl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"A64C14908EC811ECB625173F75285685","id":"88581","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"C4E247D08EC811ECB625173F75285685","id":"88582","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"45","error":false,"guid":"C82D54208EC811ECB625173F75285685","id":"88583","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aaj2n","text":"(!) For growing cells: Wash cells once with   Tris-HCl ( ) and resuspend cells with the same volume of   Tris-HCl ( ). Starvation or conjugation cells need not to be washed for another time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":56,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":103,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":115,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"b1p5f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"0C3C6CA08EC911ECB625173F75285685","id":"8868","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"ph","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"188E6A808EC911ECB625173F75285685","id":0,"number":"7.5"}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"2187EE908EC911ECB625173F75285685","id":"8869","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"3":{"type":"ph","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"2D822F808EC911ECB625173F75285685","id":0,"number":"7.5"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c91oo","text":"Shoot   of 10% Triton X-100 (first) and   of 37% formaldehyde into cells. Invert tube ~ 5 times and keep it at room temperature ( ) for  ;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":129,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":136,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"a8skl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"40DEB2B08EC911ECB625173F75285685","id":"88584","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"4501F6908EC911ECB625173F75285685","id":"88585","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"55B6D9608EC911ECB625173F75285685","id":"48912","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"25","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"5BCF5D908EC911ECB625173F75285685","id":"79608","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ulsl","text":"Collect cells by centrifugation at 1500 rpm for   and pour supernatant (! contains formaldehyde, think about waste disposal rules)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"3dnj8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"6C2BE7308EC911ECB625173F75285685","id":"79609","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6v0m6","text":"Resuspend cell pellet with ~   of 4% formaldehyde/ 3.4% sucrose fixative, mixing cells by gentle pipetting is recommended.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"8gm4h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"7F2ED8B08EC911ECB625173F75285685","id":"88586","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"etbkl","text":"Cells are ready to apply onto slides. After drying in a fume hood for 1hr, slides are ready for staining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
